remarks.para: Heater elements in one probe may be inoperative provided aircraft is not operated in visible moisture or in known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: For probe heat to be considered operative, both heater elements in that probe must be operative.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Operations into visible moisture or in known or forecast icing conditions is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "___ PITOT-STATIC PROBE HEATER INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
